Verses: 1 mose Aaron Enbavargaludaiya Kaiyinkeezhth Thangal Thangal Senaigalinpadiye Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Isravel Puththirarudaiya Prayaanangalin Vibaram:
2 mose Thanakkuk Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye Avargal Purappattapragaaramaaga Avargaludaiya Prayaanangalai Ezhudhinaan; Avargal Ovvoru Idangalilirundhu Purappattuppannina Prayaanangalaavana:

3 mudhalaam Maadhaththin Padhinaindhaam Thedhiyile Avargal Raamasesai Vittuppurappattaargal; Paskaavukku Marunaalile, Egipthiyar Ellaarum Paarkka, Isravel Puththirar Belaththakaiyudan Purappattaargal.
4 appozhudhu Egipthiyar Karththar Thangalukkulle Sangariththa Thalaichchanpillaigalaiyellaam Adakkampanninaargal; Avargal Thevargalinperilum Karththar Needhiseluththinaar.
5 pinbu Isravel Puththirar Raamasesilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Sukkoththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
6 sukkoththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Vanaandharaththin Ellaiyilirukkira Eththaamile Paalayamiranginaargal.
7 eththaamilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Paagaalseponukku Edhiraaga Irukkira Eerodh Pallaththaakkin Munnadikkuththirumbi, Mikdholukku Munbaagap Paalayamiranginaargal.
8 eeroththai Vittup Purappattu, Samuththiraththai Naduvaagak Kadandhu Vanaandharaththirkuppoi, Eththaam Vanaandharaththile Moondrunaal Prayaanampanni, Maaraavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
9 maaraavilirundhu Purappattu, Elimukkup Ponaargal; Elimile Pannirandu Neerootrugalum Ezhubadhu Pereechchamarangalum Irundhadhu, Ange Paalayamiranginaargal.
10 elimilirundhu Purappattu, Sivandha Samuththiraththin Aruge Paalayamiranginaargal.
11 sivandha Samuththiraththai Vittup Purappattuppoi, Seenvanaandharaththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
12 seenvanaandharaththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Thopkaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
13 thopkaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Aaloosile Paalayamiranginaargal.
14 aaloosilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Revidheemile Paalayamiranginaargal; Ange Janangalukkuk Kudikkath Thanneer Illaadhirundhadhu.
15 revidheemilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Seenaai Vanaandharaththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
16 seenaai Vanaandharaththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Kiprodh Aththaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
17 kiprodh Aththaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Aasaroththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
18 aasaroththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Ridhmaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
19 ridhmaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Rimmonperesile Paalayamiranginaargal.
20 rimmonperesilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Lipnaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
21 lipnaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Reesaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
22 reesaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Kelaththaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
23 kelaththaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Saapper Malaiyile Paalayamiranginaargal.
24 saapper Malaiyilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Aaradhaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
25 aaradhaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Makkeloththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
26 makkeloththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Thaagaaththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
27 thaagaaththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Thaaraagile Paalayamiranginaargal.
28 thaaraagilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Midhkaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
29 midhkaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Asmonaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
30 asmonaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Moseroththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
31 moseroththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Peneyaakkaanile Paalayamiranginaargal.
32 peneyaakkaanilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Kidhkaadh Malaiyile Paalayamiranginaargal.
33 kidhkaadh Malaiyilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Yodhpaaththaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
34 yodhpaaththaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Epronaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
35 epronaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Esiyon Keperile Paalayamiranginaargal.
36 esiyon Keperilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Kaadhesaagiya Seenvanaandharaththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
37 kaadhesilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Edhom Dhesaththin Ellaiyilirukkira Or Ennum Malaiyile Paalayamiranginaargal.

38 appozhudhu Aasaariyanaagiya Aaron Karththarudaiya Kattalaiyinpadiye Or Ennum Malaiyinmel Eri, Ange Isravel Puththirar Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Naarpadhaam Varusham Aindhaam Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyile Maranamadaindhaan.
39 aaron Or Ennum Malaiyile Maranamadaindhapodhu, Nootrirubaththumoondru Vayadhaayirundhaan.
40 annaatkalile Kaanaan Dhesaththin Thenthisaiyil Kudiyirundha Kaanaaniyanaagiya Aaraadh Ennum Raajaa Isravel Puththirar Varugiradhaik Kelvippattaan.
41 or Ennum Malaiyai Vittup Purappattuppoi, Salmonaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.
42 salmonaavilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Poononile Paalayamiranginaargal.
43 poononilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Opoththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
44 opoththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Movaapin Ellaiyilulla Apaareemin Medugalile Paalayamiranginaargal.
45 andha Medugalai Vittup Purappattuppoi, Theeponkaaththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
46 theeponkaaththilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Almon Thiplaththaayimile Paalayamiranginaargal.
47 almon Thiplaththaayimilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Nepovukku Edhiraana Apaareem Malaigalile Paalayamiranginaargal.
48 apaareem Malaigalilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Erigovin Aruge Yordhaanaichchaarndha Movaapin Samanaana Veligalile Paalayamiranginaargal.
49 yordhaanai Saarndha Movaapin Samanaana Veligalil Avargal Pedhyesimoththaith Thodangi, Aapelsiththeemmattum Paalayamirangiyirundhaargal.
50 erigovin Aruge Yordhaanai Saarndha Movaapin Samanaana Veligalile Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
51 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Yordhaanaik Kadandhu, Kaanaandhesaththil Poi Serumbodhu,

52 aththesaththuk Kudigalaiyellaam Ungalukku Munbaagath Thuraththivittu, Avargaludaiya Ellaa Silaigalaiyum Vaarppikkappatta Avargaludaiya Ellaa Vikkirakangalaiyum Azhiththu, Avargal Medaigalaiyellaam Nirmoolamaakki,
53 dhesaththilullavargalaith Thuraththivittu, Adhile Kudiyirukkakkadaveergal; Andha Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththukkollumpadi Adhai Ungalukkuk Koduththen.

54 seettuppottu, Dhesaththai Ungal Kudumbangalukku Sudhandharangalaagap Pangittu, Adhiga Janangalukku Adhiga Sudhandharamum, Konja Janangalukkuk Konja Sudhandharamum Kodukkakkadaveergal; Avaravarkku Seettu Vizhum Idam Edhuvo, Avvidam Avaravarkku Uriyadhaagum; Ungal Pidhaakkaludaiya Koththirangalinpadiye Sudhandharam Petrukkollakkadaveergal.

55 neengal Dhesaththin Kudigalai Ungalukku Munbaagath Thuraththividaamaliruppeergalaanaal, Appozhudhu Avargalil Neengal Meedhiyaaga Vaikkiravargal Ungal Kangalil Mullugalum Ungal Vilaakkalile Koorgalumaayirundhu, Neengal Kudiyirukkira Dhesaththile Ungalai Ubaththiravappaduththuvaargal.
56 andriyum, Naan Avargalukku Seyya Ninaiththadhai Ungalukku Seyven Endru Sol Endraar.
